video.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
video.synopsis: From the creators of How to Train Your Dragon comes an all-new Netflix original series that takes Hiccup and Toothless to the edge of adventure!

episodes.synopsis: During their search for the escaped Dagur the Deranged, Hiccup and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object -- one that holds their destiny.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island to find the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds the key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.
episodes.title: Imperfect Harmony

episodes.synopsis: On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover that the indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.
episodes.title: When Darkness Falls

episodes.synopsis: Thinking he's allergic to his dragon, Fishlegs gets hypnotized. He wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.
episodes.title: Big Man on Berk

episodes.synopsis: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup and the Dragon Riders to get him back.
episodes.title: Gone Gustav Gone

episodes.synopsis: Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.
episodes.title: Reign of Fireworms

episodes.synopsis: As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick, who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.
episodes.title: Crushing It

episodes.synopsis: Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.
episodes.title: Quake, Rattle and Roll

episodes.synopsis: The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships -- and to learn exactly what the ships are.
episodes.title: Have Dragon Will Travel: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.
episodes.title: Have Dragon Will Travel: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.
episodes.title: The Next Big Sting

episodes.synopsis: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.
episodes.title: Total Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: After an attack on Berk, Astrid trains a crew of backup Dragon Riders to battle back -- but no one can guess how soon the next strike will hit.
episodes.title: Astrid's Team

episodes.synopsis: A new enemy named Ryker Grimborn captures Stormfly, sending Hiccup, Toothless and the team off to rescue her before it's too late.
episodes.title: Night of the Hunters: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize that someone close to them is working with the enemy.
episodes.title: Night of the Hunters: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full. Can his friends save him?
episodes.title: Bad Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: Snotlout and Astrid must deliver a special battle axe to a family wedding, but when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan they have to work together.
episodes.title: Snotlout Gets the Axe

episodes.synopsis: After Hiccup and Toothless heroically save Barf and Belch, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt by abandoning riders Ruff and Tuff.
episodes.title: The Zippleback Experience

episodes.synopsis: Ryker is determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, so he heads to Glacier Island to find the Snow Wraith that the Dragon Riders are protecting.
episodes.title: Snow Way Out

episodes.synopsis: When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army.
episodes.title: Edge of Disaster: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters.
episodes.title: Edge of Disaster: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons.
episodes.title: Shock and Awe

episodes.synopsis: The Skrill returns with a grudge against Hiccup and Toothless, and the Dragon Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon.
episodes.title: A Time to Skrill

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup and Astrid race to stop the Dragon Hunters from tracking the Flightmare after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn.
episodes.title: Maces and Talons: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must hatch a plan to outwit the dangerous new enemy.
episodes.title: Maces and Talons: Part 2
